description: A pirate crew led by Shoujou, the Sonar King, specializing in underwater salvage operations and sonar-based exploration around Jaya. The crew includes the Utan Divers who assist in underwater search operations.

keyMoments.title: Shoujou Pirates' Debut
keyMoments.description: The crew appears conducting salvage operations in the waters around Jaya using specialized sonar techniques.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of a specialized pirate crew focused on underwater exploration rather than traditional piracy.

keyMoments.title: Attack on the Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: The Shoujou Pirates attack the Straw Hat Pirates to avenge the defeat of their ally Masira.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's loyalty to their allies in the Saruyama Alliance.

statusHistory.reason: Crew remains active in salvage operations
